J1BAUD.original: ~z~So you here to work for him, shoot him, or arrest him? Or maybe all three?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~所以，你是来给他干活的，来把他做掉的，还是来逮捕他的？或者三种都是？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I wouldn't have him any other way.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~不然我也不会让他一直在我身边。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~No they weren't. Happy to be on board with the skipper.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~不，不会有的。他们很高兴能和老大坐一辆车。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I like what you did there, skip. Real clever.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你真的太聪明了，老大，你是我偶像。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~You're insurance. I'm the captain of this ship because I look at every possibility.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~保险措施而已。我是这艘船的船长，需要考虑所有情况。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I'm gonna get that seat because of what I done.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~经营了这么多年，我肯定会有一席之地的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~The question is "did you know about it?".
~z~You can't be too confident if you got me here?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~真有那个信心你还雇我干嘛？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~when me and the Pavanos is just putting our first pawns out there on the checkerboard.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你就想好六步以后该怎么保护我了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ask me why it matters. Women just don't understand this life of ours.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~一直说有必要吗。女人是真不明白我们这种生活。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~It means something in Alderney even if it don't in Algonquin.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~就算在Algonquin不太管用，但在Alderney总有份量。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I dunno, I was just doing what Ray told me to.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~不知道。我只是忠实执行了Ray的指令。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~or you're not going to deal with it, and you're going to be a problem that somebody else has to deal with.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~要是你办不成，你就会成为需要别人解决的麻烦。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~We gonna get that gift back and make this crew pay for their disrespect. Come on.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~赶紧夺回礼物，让他们为不尊重我付出代价。干他。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~That little harlot keeps me young, I'll tell you that.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~那个小贱人让我容光焕发，真的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ah, here they are, it's either them or the cops.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~啊，他们来了，不是他们就是条子。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Yeah, I'm in a life threatening situation and I'm having a conversation here.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~是啊，我现在性命受到威胁，还在这里跟人聊天。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Shit, sometimes I wish she'd just run off with some other guy. Leave me in peace.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~操，有时候我都希望回到家发现她跟别的男人跑了。让我得以安宁。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~or a stoical lion, who's gonna be cut down in his prime?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~还是养一只随时赴死的坦然的狮子更好？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I mean I'm going to ask you to deal with a problem,
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我的意思是，我要让你帮我解决一个麻烦。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~But that's the same all over town. This is a dying game.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~但这座城市就是这样。这是个死局。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Sometimes I feel like I'm having a heart attack with that girl.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~有时候我都觉得自己会在她面前心脏病发作。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I saw it through the scope on that rifle.
~z~My old man, God rest his soul, didn't have the balls to bring the family to the level I got it to.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我老爹，愿他安息，胆子没我大，没能让家族达到现在的实力水平。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~It's them, they're outside. Looks like Ray's here too.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~是他们。他们已经到了。看来Ray好像也来了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Marco and Pete? Oh yeah, those guys didn't make it, did they? Well, too fucking bad.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~Marco和Pete？哦对，他俩没活下来是吧？确实太可怜了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Gets us into debt and in some heavy shit with people, but... he's family.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~让我们负债累累，惹上一堆硬骨头，但...他是我的家人。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I know enough about you, your cousin, your friends...
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我很了解你，你的堂兄，你的朋友...

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I don't know. What do you think?
~z~No matter how long you're around you ain't gonna speak perfect are you?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~不管人活多少年，都不可能不说错话，对吧？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Now the thing is, these guys ain't, shall we say...
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~但现在的问题是，这些家伙没有...应该说，

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Bout time Alderney got some representation in the city.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~这座城市也该给Alderney一点面子了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ray didn't go through the correct channels.
~z~I know a lot of people around you end up in jail.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我知道你身边有许多人在监狱度过余生。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Yeah, well, they seemed like good kids.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~唉，是啊，他俩都是挺不错的小伙子。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I'd cut his cock off and shove it down his throat.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我会把他的鸡巴切下来，塞到他的喉咙里！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~shown us the appropriate respect in the past.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~一直没给我们家族应有的尊重。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Keep an eye on things, 'cause they won't be looking out for you.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~仔细盯着情况，他们不会注意到你的存在的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~If we kill every one of them slimeballs
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~要是我把他们这个混蛋家族灭门，

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Don't tell me what's due to me. I been waiting for this and working hard for this for years.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~不用你告诉我该干什么。为此我辛苦努力了好多年。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I just move on and hire some wannabe wiseguys off the street.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我再去街上找些有志向的黑手党给我干活吧。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~When I say I wish she'd run off with another guy it's a figure of speech.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我刚刚说的希望她跟别的男人跑路是夸张的说辞。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~It ain't like she's my only woman. I got a nice little goomah set up in an apartment in Acter.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~她又不是我唯一的女人。我在Acter的公寓那边还有个娘们。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I ain't gonna do shit for him no more. I don't like the way he does business.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我再也不会替他办事了。我不喜欢他的办事风格。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~They didn't even send a fucking Capo.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~他们只派了几个小喽啰，连个组长都不派！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Rats seem to get everywhere you don't want them to be.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~不想见着老鼠*的地方似乎也到处是老鼠。~n~(指叛徒)

J1BAUD.original: ~z~He's gonna be the one looking out for you during this meet.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~待会儿会面的时候是他负责安全工作。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Well, I didn't think you were here to sell me insurance.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~好吧，你长得不像是卖保险的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Wanna keep relations sweet with at least one of the families that got a seat on the Commission.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~至少也要跟委员会的家族之一搞好关系。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~That's some real sweet shit. You're bringing a tear to my eye.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~太让人感动了。我的眼睛怎么出水了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Hey, what, what ya doing? He's busy.
~z~They knew what they was signed on for. Weren't complaining on the way out, were they?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~他们知道当我手下的下场如何。在路上也没有怨言，对吧？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~A lot of people said those diamonds were theirs.
~z~You guys all friends now? Nice. You best hope you made a good first impression on Niko, boys.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你们现在都是朋友了吧？好。最好给Niko留下个好点的印象，小的们。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I know it's them. God, give me strength...
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我知道是他们。老天啊，真是受不了...

J1BAUD.original: ~z~If the Pavanos is a Liberty City family, what are they doing coming out to Alderney for this meet?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~如果Pavano家族是自由城的家族，他们为什么要来Alderney跟你见面呢？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~You gonna get a seat on that commission real soon, ain't ya boss?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你很快就能位列委员会成员了，对吧老大？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Damn right they did. That ice was a real fuck up.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~确实变复杂了。钻石那桩简直是吃了屎。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~No wonder I ain't on the Commission when my muscle is this stupid!
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~怪不得委员会不给我席位，谁让我的手下都这么弱智！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~l'll be out in a minute. Look after Ray 'til I get back.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我待会儿就走。我回来前给我看好Ray。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Yeah, uh boss, I got you this, because I care.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~好，呃，老大，我给您带来了这个，因为我在乎您。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~and you're going to deal with it,
~z~Ray was nothing to me until he started earning big and sticking his nose in places it didn't belong.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~在Ray赚到大钱，把触角伸到不属于我们的地盘之前，他对我什么都不是。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~That's just if the shit goes down, right boss? The Pavanos wouldn't fuck with you.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~只是防一手意外情况，对吧老大？Pavano家族不会暗算你的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I don't understand what you're talking about.
~z~They can't give me a seat but they can help me get one.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~他们给不了我席位，但能帮我坐上去。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Yeah, well best ain't good enough. I did my best. Made a name for the Pegorinos.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~是啊，但光尽力还是不够。我已经为家族呕心沥血了，替Pegorino家族打出了名声。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~This guy's everywhere, like a friggin' cockroach or something, ha?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~哪儿都能见到他，跟踩不死的蟑螂一样，哈？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Only, how much can I do with a guy who ain't a full Italian?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~但我能为一个不是纯种的意大利人做多少？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Exactly... I mean, we can pretty much guarantee you were followed.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~没错...我是说，我可以确认你百分百被跟踪了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~This is a declaration of war. The Pegorinos and the Pavanos are hitting the mattresses.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~这就是开战宣言！Pegorino家族和Pavano家族现在正式开战了！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I guess not. Lucky I have people like you to teach me when I'm wrong.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我觉得不会。幸好有你这样的人能在我犯错的时候提醒我。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~My wife, Angie's, gonna love this. She keeps busting my balls about trying to get on the Commission.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我夫人Angie肯定很高兴。她一直对我加入委员会的想法冷嘲热讽。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ray, you and me is gonna talk. The boss has got business.
~z~You do, but I ain't going to push.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你知道的，但我也不会逼你说。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Well, he's being paid to look out for me so saving you guys' asses would be overtime.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~其实，给他的钱只是负责我安全用的，保护你们的话算是加班。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~It don't do too well for the reputation of us Pegorinos having St Patrick that high up in our organization.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~组织高位有个绿帽子小精灵对我们Pegorino家族的声誉可不太好。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ain't nobody been given a seat since the Commission got founded.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~委员会成立以后，就再没产生过新的席位。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Yeah, even if you can't speak right, at least you can shoot straight.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~是啊，就算你这人不会说话，枪法也还是可以的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Guy who owned the diamonds, Gay Tony, is in with the Ancelottis.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~钻石的主人，基佬Tony，他站在Ancelotti家族那边。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ah these kids come and go. It ain't worth paying attention to them until they prove they can survive.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~啊，这些小伙子来来走走的。如果他们不能证明自己的生存能力，就不值得我去关注。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~We just hoping they got the manners to smile to our faces before they do it.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我们指望他们能在下手前对我们先笑一阵子就行。
~z~操他妈的自由城家族。干死他们，Niko。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Tell me about it. But I don't give a shit about them other people.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~这还用你说。但老子不在乎那些人是谁。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Shit, but times is changed. Since RICO, the Commission ain't the same.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~操，但时代变了。自从RICO*颁布，委员会就变了。~n~(组织犯罪取缔法)

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Either because they know too much and might rat.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~要么因为他知道的太多可能告发，

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Has to be. I only start paying attention to my crew when they start putting me in an awkward position.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~必须这样。只有哪个手下让我处境尴尬了，我才会关注他。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Listen to me... here's what the plan is.
~z~What I'm worried about is our involvement with getting back to Gay Tony and his connections...
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我只担心我们做的事被基佬Tony和他的盟友知道...

J1BAUD.original: ~z~You're covering me for six moves ahead
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我和Pavano家族的人刚挪完第一个兵，

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Or because they got too much power and they're too smart to get themselves clipped.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~要么因为他大权在握，头脑聪明到没那么容易被杀。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~He's the one who's been keeping Ray from drowning in a pile of shit.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~之前就是他让Ray不至于淹死在各种粪坑里面。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~They need a family with a new approach to be sitting down with 'em.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~他们需要一个有新花样的家族加入他们。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~That diamond fuck up is case in point. I'm like a fucking chess player.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~钻石那桩事就能证明。我就他妈像个下棋的。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I wonder... is it better to have a talented snake,
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我在想...是养一条聪明的毒蛇更好，

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Whatever happened to the honored society and all that shit?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~曾经的光荣组织到底都怎么了？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Hopefully they gonna respect that when it comes time to ask them for a favor.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~希望能让他们多尊重我些，要他们帮忙的时候能给点面子。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Wake up you fucking mook. Everybody is trying to fuck everybody.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~醒醒吧你个弱智。所有人都是笑里藏刀。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~You see the respect we're getting out on the street. Jesus.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你也看见外面的人对我们有多「尊重」了。老天。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~God give me strength. It's like I'm dealing with children here.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我真他妈的操了。合着我在这儿带孩子呢。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~He could have killed me. You're useless.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~万一他是来杀我的呢？你个废物。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~What the fuck is up with them diamonds?
~z~We got a lot riding on this meet with the Pavanos
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~这次我们还要大老远地去跟Pavano家族见面。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I didn't get where I am by believing what every schmuck told me.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~要是什么人说的话我都信，我就不会有今天的地位。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I got a nice little offering to the Pavanos that's gonna persuade 'em to argue my case.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我为Pavano家族准备了一份小礼物，应该能说服他们帮我。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Me and two of my guys gonna meet with a couple of boys from the Pavano family.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我和两个手下，待会儿要去见Pavano家族的几个小伙子。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~With guys like you, no wonder this 'organization' is doing so wonderfully.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~有你这样的「得力干将」，难怪这个「组织」运作得这么好。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~then maybe the other families will give me their seat on the Commission.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~或许委员会的其他家族会立刻把席位给我！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Pavanos work a little shy business on this side of the West River.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~Pavano家族在西河这边做一些小贷生意。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Alright, let's get these slimeball bastards. People like that give Italians a bad name.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~好了，让我们追上这群混蛋。就是这种人毁了意大利人的名声。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~They ain't gonna turn up their noses at that.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~礼物都给了，他们总不会反水吧。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I don't mind 'em taking a bite, I don't even make 'em give me a taste.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我不介意他们来插一脚，我都没让他们给我分成。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I let them operate out here from time to time.
~z~And right now, I don't know the answer to that question.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~现在，我还不知道这个问题的答案。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Well at least they had the respect to do it at a meet.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~他们在会面的时候来明的也算给面子了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I need these guys if we're ever gonna be taken serious...
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~没有他们，我们很难被正眼看待...

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Sit down next to Jon Gravelli, if he survives that long,
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~跟Jon Gravelli平起平坐，如果他还没死。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Niko, this is Pete and Marco. Guys, Niko.
~z~Anyways, that's why Ray ain't ever gonna make it to the level he wants to reach.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~总之，这就是Ray永远都得不到他想要的地位的原因。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~They better not think of crossing that West River and not looking over their shoulders.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~他们最好别给我趾高气昂地跑到西河这边来。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~They didn't come to your home while you and your wife were sleeping.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~至少没趁你跟你老婆睡觉的时候跑你家来暗杀。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~You giving them a nice little offering though, skip.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你不是给他们准备了一份挺好的小礼物吗，老大。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~and run all of Liberty City, the whole country maybe!
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~然后接管整个自由城，甚至是整个国家！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Yeah, but a wife is a wife. I guess it's like with my cousin. He puts me in so much shit.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~确实，但你老婆就是你老婆。我觉得就像我堂兄一样，他给我带来太多麻烦了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~But to be honest, I don't really care neither.
~z~Shut up. Jesus. You're worse than my mother.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~闭嘴啊。天哪，你比我妈话还多。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Can't wait to see the look on their faces.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我已经迫不及待地想看他们脸上的表情了。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I'm surprised you can even speak when your lips are always puckered up, kissing my ass.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~都舔到我屁股上了，你还能说出话来倒让我很惊讶。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Let's make 'em wish they was never born.
~z~Only way you know is by finding their shit all over the place in the morning.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~只有起床后看见满地老鼠屎，才会知道有老鼠在。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I can't believe them Pavanos would treat me like this. The Pegorino name should mean something to them.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~Pavano家族的孙子居然敢这样对我！Pegorino这个名字对他们应该是有份量的！

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Of course I wouldn't let some guy ball the mother of my children.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我肯定不会让野男人碰孩子他妈。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Can you do me a favor? Can you just shoot yourself to save me the trouble of doing it?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你能帮我个忙吗？你他妈给自己来一枪省得我动手好吗？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Its okay, Mrs. P, I'll deal with this.
~z~Earned a lot of good money for a lot of bad people. And this happens,
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~给这帮坏蛋赚了不少钱。结果成这样了，

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Check to make sure my ass is covered in each situation.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~确保我在任何情况下都万无一失。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Ray was helping me out with something, so I helped him with the diamonds.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~Ray帮我干了一件事，所以我就帮他弄钻石。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~You ain't the type of guy to follow orders if they weren't in your interest.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~你这种人不会服从不符合你利益的命令。

J1BAUD.original: ~z~Phil's different. He's been my man for a while.
~z~The Pavanos, are they gonna offer you a seat then?
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~那些Pavano家族的，他们是要给你一个席位吗？

J1BAUD.original: ~z~I think about what's gonna happen if this guy screws me, if this one turns state's, and so on.
J1BAUD.translated: ~z~我也考虑过有人反咬我一口，或者突然背叛。都考虑过。
